description: Dive into "Castles of Kolkata: A Royal Journey" — a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Castles of Kolkata: A Royal Journey

places.generalDescription: Mahamaya Tala in Kolkata offers a 2 BHK apartment for rent in the esteemed Ganguly 4 Sight Grand Castle project. The apartment comes with essential amenities and is available for immediate occupancy at a monthly rent of 20,000.

sources.snippet: 2 BHK apartment is available on rent in Mahamaya Tala Kolkata right away. The rent apartment is in the premium project of Ganguly 4 Sight Grand Castle which offers all basic to amenities. The rent of the 2 BHK flat is 20,000.
sources.shortName: Ganguly 4 Sight Grand Castle Rent: 6+ Flats for Rent in Ganguly 4 Sight Grand Castle, Kolkata

places.name: Mahamaya Tala
places.address: Garia, Rajpur Sonarpur, West Bengal, India

sources.snippet: Prasanna Kumar was a multifaceted genius, a prominent businessman as well as lawyer and social activist, he was also the man behind Tagore Castle, built in 1850. An extraordinary structure resembling an English castle, complete with towers and turrets, the building has been modified and built over several times, so that little remains of the original castle, unfortunately.
sources.shortName: Walking around the ‘native’ palaces of Kolkata

places.name: Tagore Castle

reviews.text: An unreserved heritage who slowly lost its beauty and elegance... I'm curious to know more about it.

Built by Jatindramohan Tagore in 1895 along the lines of Windsor Castle, this building used to be one of Kolkata's architectural marvel and a hub for arts and cultural activities.
Now in a completely run down state and little maintenance, packed with tenants and unplanned construction all along the building, it's really pathetic to see how this marvellous castle has gradually been destroyed.
A few portions of the original castle still exist while most part have been cemented, blocked off and ugly constructions above the main castle to accomodate more people.
The tenants and numerous small businesses that occupy the premises are seldom aware of the history and significance this building holds.

Such a shame that an important part of Kolkata's history and such a beautiful building could not be maintained as heritage, one could only figure out the remaining parts of the old castle, comparing the old photos with the current state of the building.

places.address: 26, Prasanna Kumar Tagore St, Jorabagan, Kolkata, West Bengal 700006, India

places.generalDescription: Prasanna Kumar Tagore Street is a fascinating destination steeped in history and culture. Named after the illustrious Prasanna Kumar Tagore, who was not only a successful businessman but also a lawyer and social activist, this street pays homage to his legacy. He was instrumental in the creation of the iconic Tagore Castle, an impressive structure reminiscent of English castles with its towers and turrets, constructed back in 1850.

sources.snippet: Tagore Street, named after Prasanna Kumar Tagore, grandson of Darpanarayan Tagore, once a diwan to the governor-general. Prasanna Kumar was a multifaceted genius, a prominent businessman as well as lawyer and social activist, he was also the man behind Tagore Castle, built in 1850. An extraordinary structure resembling an English castle, complete with towers and turrets, the building has been modified and built over several times, so that little remains of the original castle, unfortunately.
sources.shortName: Walking around the ‘native’ palaces of Kolkata

places.name: Prasanna Kumar Tagore St
